title: Penne with peas and beans
description: This creamy pasta dish is perfect for a meat free Monday. Add peas and broad beans to help you on your way to five a day.With a GI of 53 this meal is high protein, low GI provides 559 kcal per portion.
ingredients: 1 tbsp extra virgin rapeseed oil or olive oil
1 small bunch of basil, roughly chopped, a few leaves reserved for garnish
salt and freshly ground black pepper
